description: Helga Wauters is found guilty of manslaughter over the death of British 28-year-old Xynthia Hawke.
title: Belgian anaesthetist jailed for causing Brit's death while drunk
title_page: Belgian anaesthetist jailed for causing Brit's death while drunk - BBC News
maintext: Witnesses reported smelling alcohol on her when she returned. When she was taken into custody, the alcohol content in her blood was 2.38 grams per litre, or the equivalent of around 10 glasses of wine.
